# Gráficos tipo: Scatter plot

## Um gráfico que com relaciona duas variáveis:


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e558b260057dba65a4083981c44b5055'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
df <- read_xlsx("dados-diversos.xlsx")
dfcida <- read_xlsx("dados-diversos.xlsx", sheet = "fungicida_campo")
library(ggplot2)
## trat = eixo x, sev= eixo y.
dfcida |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, yld))+
           geom_jitter(whidth = 0.1,
                       color="gray60")+
  stat_summary(fun = mean,
               color = "red")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dfcida |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, sev))+
           geom_jitter(whidth = 0.1,
                       color="gray60")+
  stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se,
               color = "red")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_57ba883a7d87c8ce2cf06a8b026cd8d6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
## para trazer uma escala de sobreposição utiliza-se o alpha
dfcida |> 
  ggplot(aes(sev, yld, 
             color = trat,
             size = yld))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_70672539bbea4feaa6bc5c9f46efe8c6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dfcida |> 
  ggplot(aes(sev, yld,
             color ="gray50"))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5,
             size = 3)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = FALSE,
              color ="black",
              linetype = "solid",
              size =1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_eecd49ea9d2306e183535736848054d2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "milho") 

milho |>
ggplot(aes(method,  yield, color = method))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  facet_wrap(~hybrid)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Histograma:


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_b1c5060432c28341b2320a85d70ca9cd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(patchwork)
a <- milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = index))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10, color = "black", fill= "green")
b <-milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = yield))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10, color = "black", fill= "green")
(a | b) +
plot_annotation(tag_levels = "A",
                  title = "Graph Histo")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/histograma.png", bg = "white")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_f669590e664fb868efc3f387baeff77b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
insect <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "mortalidade")

insect |>
  pivot_longer(2:3,
               names_to = "status",
               values_to = "value") |> 
  ggplot(aes(inseticida, value, fill = status))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_d0e3c17bed944c6233226a07225bf02a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
insect <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "mortalidade")

insect |>
  pivot_longer(2:3,
               names_to = "status",
               values_to = "value") |> 
  ggplot(aes(inseticida, value, fill = status))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
